response.original_title: C’est ainsi qu’on va vers l’été
response.overview: Jacqueline is hospitalised in a long-term care unit.  Her carer, Kani, has followed her from her home to the hospital. Over time, the two women forge a singular relationship. Next to Jacqueline’s ailing body and impaired memory is Kani’s solid stature and zest for life.  Jacqueline is my mother.  All three of us are in the same boat, this film is our crossing.
response.title: Moving towards summer
